problem_text: Is it true that any finitely generated p′-isolated subgroup of a free group is separable in the class of finite p-groups? It is easy to see that this is true for cyclic subgroups. D. I. Moldavanski˘ı
answer: No, it is not (V. G. Bardakov, Siberian Math. J., 45, no. 3 (2004), 416–419).
